excerpt: TMCM-1240 is a single axis motor controller/driver board for 2-phase bipolar stepper motors. It supports SixPoint™ ramps in addition to linear ramps. TMCM-1240 is capable of driving up to 2A RMS motor current and is designed for an operating voltage of 10...30V DC supply voltage. The device provides a Step/Dir interface, an integrated SensOstep™ encoder and support for external encoder.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial FeaturesDcStep™CoolStep™SpreadCycle™StallGuard2™StealthChop™
